tasks.task: Attend and participate in a think tank meeting related to agricultural innovation.
subtasks: Listen to discussions on agricultural innovations.
Engage in dialogue about the impacts of agriculture on the environment.
Understand the role of the European Union in promoting agricultural policies.
Discuss the use of technology in farming practices, such as shallow plowing and drone monitoring.
Examine the benefits of vertical farming and plant/cell-based meat alternatives.
Address regulatory challenges in adopting new agricultural technologies.

tasks.task: Reflect on the future of agriculture and its transition towards sustainability.
subtasks: Consider the development of closed-loop, resource-efficient farming systems for extraterrestrial environments.
Recognize the potential for Earth agriculture to adopt advanced practices from space colonization.
Evaluate the importance of emphasizing biodiversity and sustainability in food production.
